pages.title: Televi-Kun Wonder Ride Book
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Saber: Gather! Hero!! The Out-of-Nowhere Dragon TV-Kun (2021, Hyper Battle Video)$(br2)Used to access Saber's $(l:saber/riders/saber#televi_kun)Televi-Kun$(/l) form
